title: Verify: Migrate Frontend Styling to Tailwind and shadcn/ui
description:
Run automated tests for task T-014.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Replace CSS modules with Tailwind CSS 4 and integrate shadcn/ui components. Refactor existing components to use new styling system.
Criteria:
- Tailwind CSS 4 and shadcn/ui installed and configured
- All components use Tailwind classes and shadcn/ui
- No remaining CSS modules
acceptance_criteria: Tailwind CSS 4 and shadcn/ui installed and configured
All components use Tailwind classes and shadcn/ui
